dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: I'm {npc.name}, and I collect various herbs.

dialog.name: tellmore
dialog.message: Eld Woods Island is a home to a variety of herbs, but I'm especially fond of Athalas.

dialog.name: athalas
dialog.message: Athalas would be very useful for me, but I don't know any accessible places to find it. If you happen to find any on your travels, please tell me where you found it.
